ygData.subject: Re: Pred Base
ygData.msgSnippet: When I exaimined the damage it seems the blast come from within our own colony, from the storage bay I think. There may be a traitor within our midst Inferno

"When I exaimined the damage it seems the blast come from within our 
own colony, from the storage bay I think. There may be a traitor 
within our midst" Inferno explained.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> -- Switchblade --
> 
> The larger Pred yells at Switchblade and he shrugs slowly. "Yah 
yah, 
> whatever. I was following orders as his majesty queen Megsy ordered 
> me too. I was uncovering artifacts from some crates in the storage 
> bay. I found them all, and all I remember after that is waking up 
to 
> a horizontal light shining through the side of the storage bay. 
> Looked like something burned a hole through the wall or something, 
> but I can say that it was definately powerful."
> 
> With an exasperated look, "So, I say whatever Perceptor we can do 
> nothing right now, so nothing we will do... We're waiting for 
> Megatron to come around." Switchblade smiles and empty smile to 
> Preceptor.
> 
> He turns back to Inferno, "So he got damaged, who pulled that one 
> off, there aren't many that can take him down easily. What 
happened?"
